name: OR_IMP_MANUFACTURER_FT
description: This table contains implant manufacturer comments.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MANUFACTURER_FT
columns.description: This item stores the manufacturer comment.
